DeepSpeed: library for scaling and optimizing deep learning training and inference

Related repos

  • DeepEP — communication library for Mixture-of-Experts and expert parallelism, with all-to-all GPU kernels and low-precision support
  • Toolkit for optimizing and deploying deep learning models across CPUs, GPUs, and NPUs
  • lightweight deep learning engine for mobile and edge devices
  • deep learning meets nonlinear dynamical systems modeling
  • Data analysis platform using large language models
  • DeepClaude: Combines DeepSeek R1 and Claude 3.5 for AI reasoning and coding
  • minimal deep learning library that runs LLaMA and Stable Diffusion
  • tensor library for machine learning with support for hardware acceleration and model inference
  • database for AI data, vectors, and deep learning workflows
